TopicTitle: Rocket going full thrust at atmospheric pressure change

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: 5800X3D | GPU: 3090 | RAM: 32GB

 

When I played KSP 2 for ~40 minutes, one thing I consistently found with the rocket I built was that during one of the shifts from one pressure level to another the rocket suddenly went full throttle, even if I had shut off the engine.

 

Edited July 11, 2023 by Anth12
